body.name: Tango Dry Iron for Industry Household Usage Upgraded Soleplate Without Steam Light-weight Portable
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 23 mins
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 23 mins
features: 【Iron for Clothes】4.6 pound shark iron, 120 vV - 60 HZ, rated power 1000 W, 7.2 foot UL rubber all copper wire with 360 ° rotation, making it more convenient for you to use. Size: 11.1x5.6x6.2 inches.(Without Steam).

【Clothing Iron】When you are ready to start using your clothes iron, place it vertically, plug in the power, rotate it to the appropriate temperature, wait for the indicator light to turn off, and you can start using it. To end using it, you need to first turn the knob to MIN, and then unplug the power.

【Temperature Regulation】Multiple temperature adjustments allow different materials of clothing to adapt to different temperatures. Choose different temperatures based on the different materials of your clothes (such as cotton, linen, and polyester), choose the appropriate temperature clockwise, and wait until the indicator light turns off before starting ironing.

【High Quality Materials】The electric iron adopts a spray aluminum base plate, which is durable, smooth and non stick, and can effectively protect clothes. The front end has a special groove, making it easy to iron the area next to the button.

【Craft Iron】In addition to ironing clothes, dry iron can also be used for decals and heat transfer patterns. It can meet the requirements of different industries for high-temperature electric irons. It can also be used for household and many industrial purposes!
body.description: CHARACTERISTIC 1. Switch between multiple temperatures at will, and choose the most suitable temperature based on your clothing material. 2. 7.22 foot UL rubber all copper wire to solve the problem of insufficient wire length. 3. Rotate the wire 360 ° to rotate the dry iron in your hand. 4. Oil sprayed aluminum base plate, super smooth, non stick to clothing, effectively protecting clothing. 5. Bottom plate groove design allows for easy ironing of the area next to the buttons. WARM TIPS 1. Please place the clothes iron vertically and do not place it on a rough surface. 2. After use, please ensure that the knob is turned to MIN. 3. It is normal for the indicator light to flash during use. WORLFLOW 1. Plug in the power, turn the knob to the appropriate temperature and wait for 1-2 minutes. 2. Only after the indicator light goes out can it start working. 3. The clothing iron will gradually cool down during operation, so the indicator light will flash. 4. When the dry iron has cooled down and the ironing has not finished, it is necessary to continue waiting to reheat the dry iron. 5. After use, please turn the knob to MIN, unplug the power, wait for cooling before proceeding with processing.
